output.sentences: I thought this was going to be an exciting day when my Aunt told me she had a surprise for me.
We arrived at the carnival and I saw all of the rides.
My Aunt asked if I wanted to go on a ride.
We rode a swing ride and took photos.
Afterwards, we raced down the tall slide.
